answers.answer: I have the same thing and I'm at 30 weeks... Idk if it's normal
Just googled it... Dont mean to scare you but you should look it up asap

My grandmother actually had that, she just had surgery to correct it. Now mind you several things can cause the same symptoms, so if you do get seen dont freak out thinking you need surgery okay love!  wish you the best of luck.
I think my doctor said it could be a sign of high blood pressure
I get it all the time, not sure what it means. I thought I was just dehydrated.
I googled it & said it could be preeclampsia but i dunno ! My blood pressure is good i just checked it. I guess ill just wait to see my doctor Wednesday!
My doctor told me if I had that  happen go to the doctor as it may be sign of  preclancia I think I am spelling that right lol

Yes it can be a sign of toxemia I had it when I was preg with my first son the doc said if you start seeing dots in your eyes that I need to come in the the office so I did and I had him via c section 3 days later at 38 weeks
Ive had it the whole time. Vision gets blurry or bad sometimes during pregnancy. I had 20/20. Now...not so much lol

Do you mean that while in the shower you see little floaty dots?  I've had this exact same thing.  I had pregnancy hypertension.  Do you have any blood pressure issues?  I never developed preeclampsia ---  but just hypertension.Sit down and rest.  That usually helped me.  Call your doctor if it continues.  Are you being seen this week?
@specialmom yea i seen floating white dots & thru this whole pregnancy i haven't had no blood pressure problems bt yea i have a doctor appointment Wednesday!
& My Doctor Never Answers The Phone! I Called The Hospital To See If I Should Go In They Said They Couldn't Give Advice Over The Phone :/

Your doctor doesn't take calls?  That's crazy---  they are supposed to for patient care.  Now, they don't answer the phone usually but you leave a message and they call you back within an hour unless you say it is an emergency.  Your doctor doesn't take messages or anything?

Nope He Just Gave Me A Number To The Doctor Office Which Is Closed On Weekends & Wen They Are Open They Never Answer Or If I Do Leave A Message They Never Call Me Back ! Yea i Have A HORRIBLE Doctor But It's To Late To Change Doctors!

Not calling you back is unacceptable.  All of our doctors from ob/ to pediatrician and general practitioner have either an answering service or an answering machine and they will always call you back. Definitely change doctors after this and maybe even report him. That's against full care for  his patients.
Yes i Am Definitely Gna Do That! Thanks!
I have it too dont worry if its nit offten i told my doctor they said its your pressure  i dont get it often ive got it twice during my pregnancy

question: Hello Ladies i Was Wondering If Yall Can Tell Me If i Should Go To The Hospital Im 36+4 & i Was Taking A Shower & All Of A Sudden Started Seeing White Dots Flashing In My Eyes! Is It Normal Please Help Im Scared Bt Dont Wanna Go In For Nothing :/
title: Dots In My Eyes???
